desc.en: Sena sets up a time to collect the blanket she lent to Sensei. They meet on a riverside cherry blossom path, and Sena unabashedly reveals her feelings for Sensei in her characteristically straightforward manner of speech.
desc.jp: Sena sets up a time to collect the blanket she lent to Sensei. They meet on a riverside cherry blossom path, and Sena unabashedly reveals her feelings for Sensei in her characteristically straightforward manner of speech.
desc.zh_cn: 为了拿回先前借给老师的毯子，{cf瀬奈}和老师约在江边的赏樱步道旁见面。见到老师后，{cf瀬奈}用她一贯的说话方式一五一十地向老师坦承自己的心意。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sena is forced to stay up late at night due to being on call. Sensei stops by to offer Sena some encouragement, and they take a short break while sharing a midnight snack.
desc.jp: Sena is forced to stay up late at night due to being on call. Sensei stops by to offer Sena some encouragement, and they take a short break while sharing a midnight snack.
desc.zh_cn: 由于身为紧急应变小组成员，{cf瀬奈}总是必须待命到深夜。为了慰劳辛苦的{cf瀬奈}，老师特地去陪{cf瀬奈}待命，而两人也就这样一边吃着宵夜，一边享受短暂的休息时光。

profile.en:
President of Gehenna's always busy Medical Emergency Club.

She transports the wounded with a stoic face no matter the situation. She may seem apathetic as she treats the wounded like inanimate cargo, but she has never once complained about transporting numerous injured people all over Gehenna.
profile.jp:
ゲヘナ学園所属、救急医学部の部長。

ゲヘナで日々起こり続ける事件・事故の中、どんな状況でも不平不満を漏らすことなく、いつも無愛想な顔で負傷者を運んでいる。数多くの負傷者を救ってきた経歴の持ち主だが、負傷者を「死体」と呼び間違える癖やその手荒な扱い方のせいで、一部の生徒からはやや遠巻きにされている。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
格黑娜学园所属，「急救医学部」的部长。

在格黑娜每天不断发生的事件事故之中，无论什么情况都毫无怨言，一直以冷淡面容运送伤员。
有着成功救下大量伤员的经验，但也许是因为有着将伤员误称为「尸体」的习惯，又或是因为她那粗暴的救援方式，一部分学生对她敬而远之。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
格黑娜学园所属，急救医学部的部长。

总是在格黑娜每日发生的事故中运送着伤患，表情平淡，从未流露出丝毫不满。虽然拥有无数拯救伤员的经历，但因其称呼伤患为「尸体」的习惯和粗鲁的手法，被一部分的学生敬而远之。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
总是在处理事故的歌赫娜急救医学部部长。

任何情况下都以一副冷淡的表情运送着伤员。虽然对待伤员的态度就像对待货物一样生硬，但一直以来，在运送歌赫娜各地的无数伤员时，她从未抱怨过一句话。

gacha.en: Where is the corpse...? I mean, where is the injured patient?
gacha.jp: 死体……いえ、負傷者はどこですか？

intro.en: I'm Himuro Sena, president of Gehenna's Medical Emergency Club. A pleasure to meet you.
intro.jp:
ゲヘナ学園救急医学部の部長、
氷室セナです。
以後お見知りおきを。
intro.zh_cn_jp:
ゲヘナ学園救急医学部の部長、
氷室セナです。
以後お見知りおきを。
intro.zh_cn_tw:
格黑娜学园急救医学部的部长，
氷室瀬奈。
今后请多指教。

desc.en: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。

desc.zh_cn: 学生们收到老师的联系后一一前往联邦学生会。为了解决眼前的状况，以{cf琳}为首收集情报与创建作战计划。为了拯救暴露在圣所的人，老师和{cf圣亚}开始寻找{cf葛叶}。听到消息后，仁耶表示搜索{cf葛叶}的任务交给自己。

desc.en: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。

desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人在列车站遇见了虚弱的{cf白子}。{cf白子}与她们发生了战斗，随后倒地。{cf星野}询问{cf白子}来自哪里，{cf白子}回答不知道。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.zh_cn: 联邦学生会的{cf琳}由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托{et夏莱}发布召集命令。{cf琳}随后拜托{cf桃香}和{cf步}代她处理在这期间的事情。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.jp: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.zh_cn: {cf佳世子}、{cf优香}、{cf亚子}、{cf花子}和{cf绫音}陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。

desc.jp:

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.jp: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.zh_cn: {cn阴阳部}表示，{cf葛业}并不在{sn百鬼夜行}的学生名册上，但提到有一个地方记载了相关内容：在{sn百鬼夜行}尚未成立时，{cf葛业}设立了“百花缭乱”以调停纷争。尽管目前仍有传言百花缭乱的委员长会直接听命于她，但由于百花缭乱的正副委员长已经长时间无法联络，因而百花缭乱即将被废部――在似乎无望之际，仁耶提出了一个方法。

desc.en: Wakamo suddenly attacks during Sensei's patrol. Luckily, Sensei is able to subdue Wakamo with the help of the Valkyrie Police School students and Sena. Sensei and Sena resume their patrol feeling that something is amiss.
desc.jp: Wakamo suddenly attacks during Sensei's patrol. Luckily, Sensei is able to subdue Wakamo with the help of the Valkyrie Police School students and Sena. Sensei and Sena resume their patrol feeling that something is amiss.
desc.zh_cn: 在老师运行巡逻工作的途中，{cf若藻}忽然现身袭击他，幸亏{cf瀬奈}和{sn女武神}警察学园的学生们及时赶到支持，老师才能顺利制服{cf若藻}。风波落幕后，老师一边压抑着心里那股说不上来的怪异感，一边和{cf瀬奈}再次投入巡逻工作当中。

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！{cf桐乃}和{cf吹雪}带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的恋情，决胜负的一天开始了！

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！{cf桐乃}和{cf吹雪}带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的恋情，决胜负的一天开始了！

desc.en: The festival concludes safely. Fubuki and Kirino are frustrated that Wakamo slipped away. Sena says that she's looking forward to patrolling together again. Chihiro stops by to apologize for not being much help before leaving. Wakamo invades Schale just as things are settling down.
desc.jp: The festival concludes safely. Fubuki and Kirino are frustrated that Wakamo slipped away. Sena says that she's looking forward to patrolling together again. Chihiro stops by to apologize for not being much help before leaving. Wakamo invades Schale just as things are settling down.
desc.zh_cn: 就这样，情人节庆典圆满地画下了句点。就在{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}为了{cf若藻}再次逃脱的事气得牙痒痒的同时，{cf瀬奈}告诉老师自己会一直期待和老师一起巡逻的机会再次到来，而赶来找他们的{cf千寻}则为了自己没能帮上忙的事向老师道歉。就在学生们纷纷离开，而众人也以为骚动彻底落幕的时候，{cf若藻}闯入了{et夏莱}。

desc.en: Sensei resumes patrolling with Sena, and they run into Chihiro. Fubuki and Kirino are transporting Wakamo to the Corrections Bureau. Wakamo escapes from the transport truck amidst all the talk of Wakamo's terrifying reputation as the "Fox of Calamity".

desc.zh_cn: 继续四处巡逻的老师和{cf瀬奈}，恰巧碰见了前来检查保全设备的{cf千寻}。与此同时，{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}正准备将{cf若藻}移送至矫正局。就在{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}热烈讨论被称为「灾厄之狐」的{cf若藻}有多么可怕时，{cf若藻}不费吹灰之力便逃出了囚车。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?

恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: Sensei manages to recapture Wakamo, who is wreaking havoc using Valkyrie Police School's equipment. Chihiro is shocked at how they lost control of their equipment, but Fubuki and Kirino shrug it off and take custody of Wakamo, saying it won't happen again.
desc.jp: Sensei manages to recapture Wakamo, who is wreaking havoc using Valkyrie Police School's equipment. Chihiro is shocked at how they lost control of their equipment, but Fubuki and Kirino shrug it off and take custody of Wakamo, saying it won't happen again.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管{cf若藻}利用{sn女武神}警察学园的装备在庆典中制造骚动，但老师很快便再次成功制伏了她。虽然{cf千寻}对于装备被偷的事感到相当傻眼，但{cf吹雪}却向她再三保证不会让这种事再度发生，两人一起和{cf桐乃}再次将{cf若藻}押上了囚车。

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: The townspeople present Sensei with a thank-you gift during a patrol. Sensei is taken aback, but Sena tells Sensei that she is also truly thankful for all they've done in the past year. The two then receive word that Wakamo has escaped yet again.
desc.jp: The townspeople present Sensei with a thank-you gift during a patrol. Sensei is taken aback, but Sena tells Sensei that she is also truly thankful for all they've done in the past year. The two then receive word that Wakamo has escaped yet again.
desc.zh_cn: 重新开始运行巡逻工作后，居民们为了感谢{et夏莱}的老师对奇普托斯的付出送上了礼物。老师感到不知所措，但{cf瀬奈}说这是居民对于自己与老师过去一年的付出所送上的谢礼，那份感激也是他们的真心。就在这温馨的时刻，两人接到{cf若藻}再次逃狱的消息。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Wakamo is once again recaptured. Chihiro demands responsibility for the string of escapes, but Fubuki maintains that things are under control and calls in Yuuka, Hasumi, Suzumi, and Chinatsu. Fubuki takes Wakamo away, insisting things will be fine thanks to their previous history with Wakamo.
desc.jp: Wakamo is once again recaptured. Chihiro demands responsibility for the string of escapes, but Fubuki maintains that things are under control and calls in Yuuka, Hasumi, Suzumi, and Chinatsu. Fubuki takes Wakamo away, insisting things will be fine thanks to their previous history with Wakamo.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管{cf若藻}很快便再度落网，但{cf千寻}在追究责任时，{cf吹雪}说着这次真的没事，并赶忙找来{cf优香}、{cf莲实}、{cf铃美}和{cf千夏}。由于有曾经和{cf若藻}交手过的帮手们协助押送，{cf吹雪}要众人尽管放一百万个心，继续押送{cf若藻}。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.en: Against all odds, Wakamo manages to clear all obstacles in her way and finally comes face-to-face with Sensei. Sensei braces for an attack, but it turns out that Wakamo's plan all along was to present Sensei with Valentine's Day chocolates.
desc.jp: Against all odds, Wakamo manages to clear all obstacles in her way and finally comes face-to-face with Sensei. Sensei braces for an attack, but it turns out that Wakamo's plan all along was to present Sensei with Valentine's Day chocolates.
desc.zh_cn: {cf若藻}越过了试图阻挠她的无数障碍，并且再次来到了老师的面前。就在老师做好即将被{cf若藻}大卸八块的觉悟时，他才得知{cf若藻}从一开始就只是为了将情人节巧克力拿给他，才会不惜一次又一次接近他。

desc.en: Mari is hard at work providing assistance to festival-goers when Sensei invites her to lunch. They enjoy a late lunch at the Black Tortoise's mobile stall when an employee accidentally suffers burns. Sensei quickly takes the employee to Joint Medical Headquarters. Serina and Sena are treating patients, but they try to keep Sensei from entering the infirmary for some reason.
desc.jp: Mari is hard at work providing assistance to festival-goers when Sensei invites her to lunch. They enjoy a late lunch at the Black Tortoise's mobile stall when an employee accidentally suffers burns. Sensei quickly takes the employee to Joint Medical Headquarters. Serina and Sena are treating patients, but they try to keep Sensei from entering the infirmary for some reason.
desc.zh_cn: 老师看到{cf玛丽}忙着帮助他人而劝他吃午餐。{cf玛丽}和老师前往{cn玄武商会}的摊贩享用迟来的午餐。过程中店员不小心烫伤了，老师便带店员去联合医疗本部。不知道为什么，治疗患者的{cf芹奈}和{cf瀬奈}阻止老师进去医护站。

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 看护病人、参加志愿服务

name.zh_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.en: After their last patient leaves for the day, Serina thanks Sena for helping out at the Joint Medical Headquarters. Sena mentions the rumors spreading about the Remedial Knights, but Serena gets flustered and immediately changes the subject.
desc.jp: After their last patient leaves for the day, Serina thanks Sena for helping out at the Joint Medical Headquarters. Sena mentions the rumors spreading about the Remedial Knights, but Serena gets flustered and immediately changes the subject.
desc.zh_cn: {cf芹奈}和{cf瀬奈}在联合医疗本部照顾着病患。在最后一位患者回去后，{cf芹奈}向协助护理工作的{cf瀬奈}表达衷心的感谢。{cf瀬奈}也询问了在坊间流传着，关于「{cn救护骑士团}」的传言，但{cf芹奈}却一脸为难地笑而不答，赶忙邀请{cf瀬奈}前去参加营火晚会。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
